Simple Linear regression model
  yi = b0 + b1xi + e
  
  ```{r}
  
  tail(Cars93)
  
  ```
  
  
  
  Гетероскедатичность
  
  
  
  ```{r}
  y = Cars93$Price
  x = Cars93$Horsepower
  
  lm1 = lm(y ~ x)
  summary(lm1)
  plot(x, y)
  abline(lm1)
  
  predict(lm1, new = data.frame(x = c(240, 260)))
  
  
  predict(lm1, new = data.frame(x = c(240, 260)), interval= "confidence")
  
  
  
  predict(lm1, new = data.frame(x = c(240, 260)), interval= "pred")
  
  
  ```
